Index.meta_title: MailGress - Archive, Analyze, and Optimize Your Competitors' Email Strategies
Index.meta_description: MailGress helps businesses archive and analyze newsletter emails from competitors to unlock marketing insights and drive competitive advantage.

Hero.title: Unlock the power of <important>email intelligence</important> with MailGress.
Hero.description: Archive and analyze your competitors' newsletters to gain insights and stay ahead in the market. Leverage cutting-edge data analytics built with React, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS.

Features.section_title: Boost Your Marketing Strategy with Competitive Email Analysis
Features.section_description: MailGress offers robust features to analyze and optimize your competitors' email campaigns.
Features.feature_description: Leverage advanced tools to archive and analyze emails from competitors and gain actionable insights.

Pricing.section_title: Choose the Perfect Plan for Your Needs
Pricing.section_description: Whether you're an individual marketer or an enterprise, MailGress has a plan that suits your competitive research needs.

PricingPlan.premium_plan_description: For teams needing deeper competitive insights.
PricingPlan.enterprise_plan_description: For large organizations with advanced needs.

FAQ.answer_1: MailGress is a platform that helps businesses archive and analyze their competitors' newsletters, providing actionable insights for competitive advantage.
FAQ.answer_2: MailGress captures newsletters from your competitors and stores them for easy analysis and reporting.
FAQ.answer_3: MailGress offers a free plan with basic features, as well as paid plans with advanced analytics.
FAQ.answer_4: MailGress uses encryption and security best practices to ensure your data is safe.
FAQ.question_5: Can I export the analyzed data?
FAQ.answer_5: Yes, MailGress allows you to export data in CSV or PDF format for further analysis.

CTA.title: Ready to take your marketing to the next level?
CTA.description: Start using MailGress today to archive and analyze your competitors' newsletters.

ProtectFallback.not_enough_permission: You do not have permission to perform this action

SignIn.meta_description: Log in to access your competitive email insights dashboard.

SignUp.meta_description: Create an account to start analyzing your competitors' email campaigns.

Dashboard.meta_description: Access and manage your archived newsletters and competitive insights on the MailGress platform.

DashboardIndex.title_bar_description: Welcome to your competitive email insights dashboard
DashboardIndex.message_state_description: You can customize your dashboard by editing the settings in dashboard/page.tsx
DashboardIndex.message_state_button: Need help? Check out our support.

UserProfile.title_bar_description: View and manage your user profile and account settings

Billing.title_bar_description: Manage your MailGress subscription and billing information
Billing.current_section_description: Adjust your subscription plan to match your research needs.

CheckoutConfirmation.message_state_description: Your payment has been successfully processed. Thank you for choosing MailGress!

Todos.title_bar_description: View and manage tasks related to your email research

AddTodo.add_todo_section_description: Fill in the form below to add a new task for your email analysis

EditTodo.edit_todo_section_description: Fill in the form below to update your task

TodoForm.title_description: Enter a descriptive title for your research task.
TodoForm.message_description: Enter detailed information about the task.
